title: ESL
description: ESL specializes in the Esports industry, celebrated for its vibrant and energetic brand colors. Their palette includes a lively blue (#0D9DDB) and a bright, engaging light blue (#48B8E7), complemented by a neutral light grey (#EFECEA) and a classic black (#2C2B2B). These colors are publicly recognized through sources like Turtle Entertainment's official website and press releases.
